title: Quick ID of this popular web font, please
content:
Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sample.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015234211/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_7.png) | 10.88 KB |
author: wnf

comments.content:
Your sample is too small to be sure, it looks like **[Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015234211/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova/)** by Mark Simonson

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015234211/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

I think you are right and I thank you for the ID!

Cheers

wnf
